title: DIE!
content:
I'm looking forward to keeping my television turned off and setting up broadband so I can download some quality series. This by definition excludes reality TV.

I'm also looking forward to the day the public stops making dodgy television programming profitable. Since that day probably won't arrive, I'll just stick with my plan outlined above. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

title: Grrg
content:

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

Wow! looks like nobody likes reality shows.
I can't stand them. why would you want to watch reality shows when you can live in it? Part of the reason people watch TV is to forget their dreary lives for an hour, not watch other people's dreary lives.
